name: v1.4.16 - Really Fix Local Playback
body:
### Known issues

- HIDIVE integration is broken until further notice.

See [bugs](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/yuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Abug) for more!

Fixed:
- Local file playback (for real this time) #614 #602
  Thanks @r52!

name: v1.4.15 - Fix Local File Playback, List Search
body:
Changes:
- Removed the auto-updater as it barely worked on Windows, and didn't on Linux and Mac.
  _(You will now have to download each update manually ðŸ˜Ÿ)_

Fixes:
- Fixed creating US Crunchyroll sessions. #591 #593 #596
- Fixed local file playback. #552 #573 #575 #594 #601

Misc:
- Updated dependencies.

---

### Known issues

- HIDIVE integration is broken until further notice.

See [bugs](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/yuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Abug) for more!

name: v1.4.13 - Fix Automatic Episode Scrolling
body:
Fixes:
- Automatically scrolling to the next unwatched episode in Queue! (Thanks @LoganxDev) #521 #524

Misc:
- Updated dependencies. #530

---

### Known issues

- HIDIVE integration is broken until further notice.

See [bugs](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/yuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Abug) for more!

name: v1.4.12 - More More Fixes
body:
Fixes:
- Null pointers caused by missing episode thumbnails from Crunchyroll
- A null pointer related to lists
- The tooltips on anime scores

---

### Known issues

- HIDIVE integration is broken until further notice.

See [bugs](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/yuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Abug) for more!

name: v1.4.11 - More Error Fixes
body:
Fixed:
- Local file episodes being ordered incorrectly #453
- Null pointers due to:
  - Missing simkl rating
  - Some random missing session thing?
  - Missing AniDB data
- Failure to fetch MAL rating resulting in error instead of silently returning null
- Error message from failure to parse local file

---

### Known issues

- HIDIVE integration is broken until further notice.

See [bugs](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/yuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Abug) for more!

name: v1.4.10 - Error Fixing
body:
Fixed:
- Some of the errors popping up all over the place.

---

### Known issues

- HIDIVE integration is broken until further notice.

See [bugs](https://github.com/BeeeQueue/yuna/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+sort%3Aupdated-desc+label%3Abug) for more!
